overview: Bangaru Kanuka (English: Golden Gift) is a 1982 Telugu, Romance film, produced by Raola Ankhaiah Goud on Ravindra Films banner[2] and directed by V. Madhusudhan Rao.[3] Starring Akkineni Nageswara Rao, Sridevi, Sujatha in the lead roles[4] and music composed by Satyam.
title: Bangaru Kanuka
